game.name: Royal Wedding Cake
game.description:
Like many other girls, your favourite princess Elsa also wants to learn how to prepare wedding cakes for a royal wedding occasion. She has recently taken the cake preparation classes and now want to practice them in the virtual world. However, the princess needs your help to perform the entire cake preparation process. Would you like to join her now? Play Royal Wedding Cake online to guide the princess prepare and decorate the scrumptious wedding cakes! Make sure that she completes her delivery on time. 
The princess loves eating pasty whenever she has a craving for sweet. Your ultimate cooking skills have encouraged her to appoint you as her assistant in the kitchen. Do your best to create the most delicious wedding cake you have ever made in this brand new girls game! Now it is up to make the royal bride and groom feel special through your good work. Your scrumptious cake will help the couple relax before the ceremony. Use all the ingredients and instructions to create their own dream cake!
The left bottom of the screen will show several flavour options. Click the big play button and get ready to jump into the biggest cake preparation task in this HTML5 cooking game! You can notice different colours on the screen and each colour denotes a unique flavour. Decorate your cake with some colourful sugars while adding some cream to it! Try as many combinations as you can to prepare the dream cakes for the bride and groom! Good luck to dish up best cake on the special occasion of their lives!
game.metaTitle: Royal Wedding Cake, Cooking Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Royal Wedding Cake at atmegame.com ! We have selected this cooking games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE TO DECORATE THE CAKE
